short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show/hide the password stored in the browser. Develop by hadesker.net

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
♨ You enter a sequence of characters in the password box but don't know if you entered it correctly, you need to check it again?
♨ You store your password in your browser to help you log in quickly every time you visit a website, but now you don't remember what it was. You need to review that password to log in on another device?
☞ "Show password" will help you solve those problems. The password to show or hide is up to you to decide. All with just one click.
